properties.name: Initiative for Responsible Mining Assurance
properties.description: The answer to global demand for more socially and environmentally responsible mining.
properties.body:
The Initiative for Responsible Mining Assurance was incorporated as a 501c3 in 2018. Their goal was to bring their Self Assessment working document out of paper into a globally accessible web application.

As part of the Viable team I designed a system that allowed for the growth of the Self Assessment with an API-first approach that enables them to add and modify the chapters, questions, and help material that make up the assessment.

To help them showcase the companies taking part in the Self Assessment, I designed a map that allows each company to show or hide specific company information and share the geographic area they work in.
properties.deliverables: Self Assessment Platform, Web Map, and API
properties.exit: I continue to work with the team at the Izaak Walton League to expand the platform with new functionality, our next phase begins in 2019.
